metadata.name: Blinding light of the sun on fresh snow
metadata.description:
On that morning after the first snow has fallen, there is a magic of some kind in the air.  The sun takes on a different presence, its light feels almost solid, and the beauty of nature's geometry is revealed in the trees.


This series is a kind of meditation for me. It starts as a freeform sketch, drawn - usually by hand on a small notecard - without any thoughts on what the image should be. I follow the lines that my subconscious mind creates, and find the image that is trying to be born from it. There is no intentional stylistic or thematic relationship to the images here, aside from the process used in creation.

included on this NFT is all the iterations involved in creating this art - the first pencil sketch on 4X6 in notebook paper, the initial digital painting from 2021, and the updated artwork from Jan 2023.  If additional versions are created in the future, they will either be added here or airdropped to holders.
